Articles.Content:
The first Fidgety Digit Astrotech design, The Ruby!

Mid Range Interplanetary Scout and Light Hauler

Can be built and put into orbit using completely stock parts! (But SpaceY makes it a little easier)

Plenty of room to be converted to do soooooo many things, comes with docking port, drills, fuel converter, plenty of power, flies surprisingly well for how good she looks but could always use a bit more oompf.....would love to hear some feedback.

![JdxblNWhseJS1u3m0BQbZvGGLKe8f6s2_yZN3dVCZw4?size=1024x768&size_mode=2](https://photos-1.dropbox.com/t/2/AACRQulXysCVPJjvi_wNZvwjdmOZJnTccMNTRQkZl431Gw/12/434521386/png/32x32/1/_/1/2/Ominous.png/CKqKmc8BIAEgAiADIAQgBSAGIAcoBw/JdxblNWhseJS1u3m0BQbZvGGLKe8f6s2_yZN3dVCZw4?size=1024x768&size_mode=2)

Just a little labor of love really, if you guys really like it I'll post the craft file....but as of right now I've never posted one before so I would have to figure that one out. 

Cheers!
